data.title: The Flight of the Bucket (Rudyard Kipling)
data.meta_description: NotesPre-admonisheth the writer:—"H'm, as a subject it is well enough!—"Who wrote "Sordello finds no subject tough." Well, Jack and Jill—God knows the life they led(The poet never told us, more's the pity)Pent up in some ...
